metadata.title: Hey LiSA | AI Agent for the Web3
metadata.description: LiSA is a non-custodial AI agent for the web3. Swap, bridge or transfer tokens from the chat. Let LiSA backtest and execute your trading strategy on-chain.

notice.title: dev note
notice.content: LiSA is currently in closed alpha development. Documentation reflects planned features and may change. Check our changelog and roadmap for current development status.

contact.title: Contact
contact.secure_communication: For secure communication, use our PGP public key below:

not_found.sub_text: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't exist.

blog.title: HQ
blog.sub_title: All the latest transmissions and updates from LiSA.
blog.meta_description: News from the LiSA team. Follow our development journey, product releases, technical deep-dives, and thoughts on building the future of non-custodial Web3 AI.

lab.title: Lab | Hey LiSA
lab.description: Explore experimental projects and tools from LiSA's research labs. Discover on-chain archaeology, prototype trading interfaces, and cutting-edge Web3 experiments.

tales_from_mines.title: Tales from the Mines
tales_from_mines.subtitle: On-chain archaeology
tales_from_mines.description: On-chain archaeology for the curious. Dig through old blocks, surface forgotten signals, and publish narrative notes, datasets, and tiny code artifacts.

lisa.title: [LiSA]
lisa.subtitle: Intelligence for ur wallets
lisa.description: Swaps, bridges, and transfers on any EVM blockchain, from chatting with LiSA. Natural language to complex DCA, invest, and trading strategies enforced on-chain and on Hyperliquid.

jensoo.title: Jensoo AI
jensoo.subtitle: Quorum whispers
jensoo.description: Pose a query. A quorum of models and research tools convene; two agents orchestrate the debate. The verdict can be sealed, hashed, and pinned to uncensorable storage (e.g., OP_RETURN, IPFS). Paid in $LISA.

pokpak.title: 0xPokPak
pokpak.subtitle: Solidity security agent
pokpak.description: An audit agent fed with Solidity security lore: known exploits, patterns, and war stories. Run targeted checks, generate diffs, and export findings. Paid in $LISA.

modal.title: [LiSA]
modal.subtitle: intelligence for ur wallet
modal.description: LiSA is currently in closed alpha development. Access is limited while we refine core features. Check our documentation, changelog, and roadmap for updates. Leave your email below to follow future developments.

mobility.title: Web3 ultra mobility
mobility.description: Swaps, bridges, and transfers across EVM, directly from chat.

invest.title: Invest smartly
invest.description: Natural language to investment strategies enforced on-chain.

trading.title: Trading with AI
trading.description: Natural language to strategies enforced on Hyperliquid and GMX.

portfolio.title: Portfolio oversight
portfolio.description: Manage DeFi positions, track balances, and get notifications on price, news, and custom triggers.

custody.title: 100% non custodial
custody.description: Your keys, your funds. LiSA never holds or controls your assets.

token.title: $LISA Token
token.description: ERC-20 on Ethereum. Required for LiSA dApp access and services like Jensoo AI or 0xPokPak. Fair launch date to be announced. Subscribe for news.

form.prompt: <LiSA> drop ur email for dev updates
form.success: <LiSA> email noted! we'll ping u on updates (u can also follow on X)
form.error: Please enter a valid email address.
form.rate_limited: Please wait a moment before submitting again.

error.sub_text: We're sorry, but an error occurred while processing your request.
